actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to reimburse the city of Frederick, MD, for money paid by the citizens of such city to save and hold harmless valuable military and hospital supplies owned by the US Government.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to reimburse the city of Frederick, Maryland, for funds paid to the Confederate Army on July 9, 1864, in return for which such Army did not destroy Federal military and hospital supplies, plus interest incurred by the city in financing the repayment of such sums to the banks from which provided the cash for such payment.

titles.title: A bill to reimburse the city of Frederick, MD, for money paid by the citizens of such city to save and hold harmless valuable military and hospital supplies owned by the US Government.
